summary: This document is an email chain from July 11, 2019, between FBI personnel and a Wall Street Journal reporter. The reporter, Nicole Hong, requests comment on a story about Ghislaine Maxwell, citing a sworn affidavit from an alleged victim who claims to have reported a 1996 sexual assault by Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein to the FBI and NYPD, with no action taken. The FBI declines to comment.

persons.name: Nicole Hong
persons.context: A Wall Street Journal reporter who emails the FBI requesting comment on a story about Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein, citing a sworn affidavit from an alleged victim.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Described as a 'top lieutenant' for Jeffrey Epstein and accused in a sworn affidavit of sexually assaulting an alleged victim in 1996 in Ohio alongside Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named alongside Ghislaine Maxwell in a sworn affidavit alleging he sexually assaulted a victim in 1996 in Ohio.

connections.description: Maxwell is described as a 'top lieutenant' for Epstein, and both are accused together in a sworn affidavit of sexually assaulting an alleged victim in 1996.
Nicole Hong is a reporter contacting the FBI for comment on a story about allegations against Ghislaine Maxwell.
Nicole Hong is a reporter contacting the FBI for comment on a story about allegations involving Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Alleged Sexual Assault in Ohio
events.description: A sworn affidavit from an alleged victim states she was sexually assaulted by Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein in a mansion in Ohio.

events.title: Report to FBI and NYPD
events.description: The alleged victim reported the 1996 sexual assault incident to the FBI and NYPD. According to the victim, the FBI took no action against Maxwell or Epstein.

events.title: Wall Street Journal Story Inquiry
events.description: Reporter Nicole Hong contacts the FBI requesting comment on a story about Ghislaine Maxwell and the 1996 allegations. The FBI declines to comment.

keyFacts: A sworn affidavit from an alleged victim accuses Ghislaine Maxwell and Jeffrey Epstein of sexually assaulting her in 1996 in a mansion in Ohio.
The alleged victim reported the 1996 incident to both the FBI and NYPD, and claims the FBI took no action against Maxwell or Epstein.
In July 2019, a Wall Street Journal reporter contacted the FBI for comment on these allegations, but the FBI declined to comment.
The document is an internal FBI email chain forwarding a media inquiry, indicating the allegations were being reported in major news media.
